name: Human VS Monster
description:
Hello,

This is a game mixed genres RTS & ACT & RPG. 

The game target is to destroy monster base.

The are two control modes in the game. In RTS Mode, you become the battle field commander  to build your army and give them order. In ACT mode, you can play your hero character killing monsters with your hand! Your character can level up after killing monsters. Don't be hesitate to give a try!

Anyway, have fun!
